TopicTitle: Adding a tag to the steam workshop for creations that use dlc

Articles.Content: It's definitely annoying searching through the workshop to find a cool creation just to realize it needs the dlc but not knowing beforehand.

I'm not sure if that's even possible on steam side. I mean I haven't seen such thing anywhere, the only way to tell if something needs a DLC/another addon is to click on it. At least from my experience.

Its sort of already there, but not as a tag by which you can limit your search result to.  It would be nice if adding the MH "Required DLC" thing also added the Making History tag.

 

 

It would be much better than the "Getting Started" tag, to be sure.  It has a whopping 2 submissions to it.
